member.name: D2D1_SVG_UNIT_TYPE
member.summary: Defines the coordinate system used for SVG gradient or clipPath elements.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_UNIT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_UNIT_TYPE_USER_SPACE_ON_USE
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'userSpaceOnUse' value.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_UNIT_TYPE.D2D1_SVG_UNIT_TYPE_OBJECT_BOUNDING_BOX
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'objectBoundingBox' value.
